thread.section_title: Ski.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ski.com | www.ski.com | 3 of 44
thread.title: Laurel

author: Laurel
title: Laurel
text: Leslie was fantastic! We had a very limited timeframe and couldn't commit until just over a month before departing for our European ski trip, plus it is during ski week for European countries so availability was extremely limited. Nonetheless, Leslie was able to find great accommodations at a top ski resort for a great price exactly on the dates we need. We're very excited to take this trip!
